mapper.select: SELECT a.emp_code as empCode , a.name as name , d.assign_name as assignName , e.dep_name as depName , b.work_date as workDate , c.atten_type as attenType , b.work_start as workStart , b.work_end as workEnd , b.work_over as workOver FROM employee a JOIN attendance b ON a.emp_code = b.emp_code JOIN att_code c ON b.atten_code = c.atten_code JOIN assignment d ON a.assign_code = d.assign_code JOIN department e ON a.dep_code = e.dep_code WHERE 1=1 AND a.emp_Code = #{empCode}
